name: lum-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is afflicted with a major status ailment, it consumes this item to cure the ailment. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures any major status ailment.
short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure any status condition or confusion.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from any status condition during battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from any status condition during battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from any status condition during battle.
